oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Letter from F. M. Goodlett to his father
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Letter from Private F. M. Goodlett, Company K 6th Piquet (Picket) South Carolina, to his father, Wm. H. Goodlett. Private Goodlett describes his life in camp in Virginia as well as the health of various acquaintances. At one point, he tells his father, "Wee [sic] heard here last night Gen. Lee had captured and taken 15 thousand of the enemy in Western Va. He has been trying to surround them for some time."
